statements.select:
SELECT TOP 1000 T.OBJID, T.TASK_NO, CASE T.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '移载' END AS CMD_TYPE, T.SLOC_NO, T.ELOC_NO, T.SLOC_PLC_NO, T.ELOC_PLC_NO, T.CREATION_DATE, T.EXCUTE_DATE, T.FINISH_DATE, T1.MATER_NO, T1.MATER_NAME, T.ROUTE_NO, T.TRANSFER_NO, T.FINISH_STATUS, T.PALLET_NO, T.ORDER_LINE_GUID, CASE T.CMD_STEP WHEN '00' THEN '指令生成' WHEN '02' THEN '指令下传' ELSE '异常' END AS CMD_STEP, T.PACKAGE_GUID, T.ERR_NO, T.ERR_NAME FROM Z50_WBS_TASK_CMD T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T.PACKAGE_GUID = T1.PACKAGE_GUID
T.TASK_NO like '%'+#where.TASK_NO#+'%'
T.PALLET_NO like '%'+#where.PALLET_NO#+'%'
T.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY T.OBJID DESC

SELECT T.OBJID, T.TASK_NO, CASE T.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '移载' END AS CMD_TYPE, T.SLOC_NO, T.ELOC_NO, T.SLOC_PLC_NO, T.ELOC_PLC_NO, T.CREATION_DATE, T.EXCUTE_DATE, T.FINISH_DATE, T1.MATER_NO, T1.MATER_NAME, T.ROUTE_NO, T.TRANSFER_NO, T.FINISH_STATUS, T.PALLET_NO, T.ORDER_LINE_GUID, CASE T.CMD_STEP WHEN '00' THEN '指令生成' WHEN '02' THEN '指令下传' ELSE '异常' END AS CMD_STEP, T.PACKAGE_GUID, T.ERR_NO, T.ERR_NAME FROM Z50_WBS_TASK_CMD T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T.PACKAGE_GUID = T1.PACKAGE_GUID
T.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
